ch0285_41_kai/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! If you’re
heading out today, mind if I come too?
ch0285_41_kai/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m really looking forward to exploring
this great wide world with you!
ch0285_41_kai/7101_0701_01_10:
You want to know what caution and
foresight mean?
ch0285_41_kai/7101_0701_02_10:
They mean thinking carefully about what
lies ahead!
ch0285_41_kai/7101_0701_03_10:
Can’t say I’ve been doing much of that
since I came to Pasio, though.
ch0285_41_kai/7102_0701_01_10:
Pasio is so well lit, even at night.
It feels safe.
ch0285_41_kai/7102_0701_02_10:
Back in Hisui, I had to use torches,
but they weren’t nearly as bright as this.
ch0285_41_kai/7102_0701_03_10:
And most importantly, it’s not hot!
Being around open flames is so
uncomfortable.
ch0285_41_kai/7103_0701_01_10:
Terastallizing can actually change your
Pokémon’s type.
ch0285_41_kai/7103_0701_02_10:
That means even when you think you
have the upper hand, it can slip away—
and the reverse can happen too.
ch0285_41_kai/7103_0701_03_10:
It opens up a whole new range of
strategies. Terastallizing could make
battles even more exciting!
ch0285_41_kai/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve been practicing my flute for the
upcoming festival.
ch0285_41_kai/7104_0701_02_10:
I hope I can create a space where
everyone can enjoy it!
ch0285_41_kai/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s take a picture together later!
ch0285_41_kai/7105_0701_02_10:
Wearing this new outfit, I feel like I have
to capture this moment—not just let it
become a memory.
ch0285_41_kai/7105_0701_03_10:
Plus, I’m curious to see what side of you
the picture brings out!
ch0285_41_kai/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! Here, this is for you.
ch0285_41_kai/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m so grateful for everything you do.
Let’s keep giving it our best!
ch0285_41_kai/2501_0701_01_10:
Every day since I arrived on Pasio,
I’ve been thinking about how vast the
world truly is.
ch0285_41_kai/2501_0701_02_10:
From Paldea’s Terastallizing to Galar’s
Dynamaxing...
ch0285_41_kai/2501_0701_03_10:
there must be so much more out there
to discover!
ch0285_41_kai/2501_0702_01_10:
I want to see everything in this great
wide world someday!
ch0285_41_kai/2501_0702_02_10:
But to do that, I need to get stronger
with my Pokémon!
ch0285_41_kai/2511_0701_01_10:
Gloria let me try this dish called “curry,”
and it was really good. Even Typhlosion
seemed to like it!
ch0285_41_kai/2511_0701_02_10:
I also had something called a “sandwich”
from a friend from Paldea. That was
tasty, too!
ch0285_41_kai/2511_0701_03_10:
The world really is full of delicious food,
isn’t it?
ch0285_41_kai/2511_0702_01_10:
Everyone’s been so kind to me. I want to
find a way to return the favor.
ch0285_41_kai/2511_0702_02_10:
When it comes to Hisuian food, potato
mochi’s probably the most well-known,
right?
ch0285_41_kai/2511_0702_03_10: Would you mind being my taste tester?
ch0285_41_kai/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I was so excited about
today’s festivities that I woke up a
little early!
ch0285_41_kai/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s pretty hot right now, isn’t it? Do you
know any spots where we could enjoy a
brisk breeze?
ch0285_41_kai/3005_0701_01_10:
Space exists just beyond the sky, right?
I wonder how vast it is...
